item.title: AdaBest
item.description: I am pleased to announce that our paper, “AdaBest: Minimizing Client Drift in Federated Learning via Adaptive Bias Estimation,” has been accepted at ECCV 2022. Our algorithm significantly improves the stability and performance of large-scale and heterogeneous Federated Learning optimization in many benchmarks. ğŸ†ï¸ Congratulations to Marzie Saghayi, Laya Rafiee, Sharut Gupta, Stan Matwin, and Mohammad Havaei and many thanks for their contributions ğŸ™Œï¸.
